about_the_game:
As the Black Death sweeps Europe and beyond, a new threat emerges as the dead rise up to feast upon the living



The Dead Rising DLC adds an optional Undead mode to the Kingdom Wars 4 campaign

Already dealing with those infected with the Black Death, players will soon face an even deadlier plague as the dead rise up on the battlefield, destroying everything in their path

What will you do to stop the hordes of undead at your castle walls?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 / Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Software installations required (included with the game) include Steam Client, Visual C++ 2008 Redistributable, DirectX and Microsoft .NET 4. Internet connection required to play the multiplayer porition of the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 Processor or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980 / Radeon RX 490
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Software installations required (included with the game) include Steam Client, Visual C++ 2008 Redistributable, DirectX and Microsoft .NET 4. Internet connection required to play the multiplayer porition of the game.
